name: inconsiderably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very small and therefore not important or not worth considering: not inconsiderably The daily earnings of the craftsmen were reduced not inconsiderably by their departure. All this was achieved despite the not inconsiderably dramatic difficulties he encountered.
More examplesFewer examplesShe helped not inconsiderably in the creation of one of cinema's most well-loved characters.Income from audiobooks helps not inconsiderably to keep both authors and voice actors afloat.He seemed to be enjoying himself, and not inconsiderably.
